description: Basilisk AV Feature Tracking - Inline Strudel Visualizations

features.name: Inline Visualization Infrastructure
features.description: Core infrastructure for inline visualization widgets

verificationCriteria.description: VisualizationManager singleton exists and is exported
Widget registration via registerWidget() method
Animation loop queries pattern via getCurrentPattern()
Time synchronization via getCurrentTime()
Audio analyser connected for audio-reactive visualizations
Console logs show '[VizManager] Registering widget:' on widget creation

features.name: Inline Scope Visualization (._scope())
features.description: Oscilloscope waveform visualization using Web Audio API analyser

verificationCriteria.description: Canvas element appears inline below the code
Oscilloscope waveform displays (NOT a black canvas)
Waveform updates in real-time (~60fps via requestAnimationFrame)
Waveform reflects audio output accurately
Console shows: '[VizManager] Drawing scope to canvas'
Re-evaluating pattern updates the visualization

features.name: Inline Pianoroll Visualization (._pianoroll())
features.description: Horizontal piano roll showing note events over time

verificationCriteria.description: Canvas element appears inline below the code
Piano roll displays notes (NOT a black canvas)
Notes appear at correct MIDI pitches (C, E, G as horizontal bars)
Playhead (white vertical line) scrolls showing current position
Notes are visible with active/inactive colors
Console shows: '[VizManager] Drawing pianoroll - haps: [N]'
Works with both note() and n() patterns

features.name: Inline Punchcard Visualization (._punchcard())
features.description: Vertical piano roll (punchcard style) showing note events

verificationCriteria.description: Canvas element appears inline below the code
Punchcard displays (vertical pianoroll orientation)
Events show as colored bars
Console shows: '[VizManager] Drawing punchcard'

features.name: Inline Spiral Visualization (._spiral())
features.description: Spiral visualization showing pattern events as arcs on a spiral
features.implementationNotes: Implemented spiral drawing using polar coordinate math (fromPolar, xyOnSpiral, spiralSegment). Adapted from @strudel/draw/spiral.mjs. Supports all configuration options: stretch, inset, margin, thickness, activeColor, inactiveColor, playheadColor, playheadLength, steady, fade, padding.

verificationCriteria.description: Canvas element appears inline below the code
Spiral visualization renders (NOT placeholder text)
verificationCriteria.expectedBehavior: Spiral arms emanate from center with pattern events as colored arcs

verificationCriteria.description: Events appear as arc segments along spiral arms
Spiral rotates with playback time
Console shows: '[VizManager] Drawing spiral - haps: [N]'
Re-evaluating pattern updates the visualization

acceptanceCriteria: Spiral arms rotate continuously with current playback time
Pattern events (haps) appear as colored arcs along the spiral
Events in the past fade or change color vs future events
margin option controls spacing between spiral arms

features.name: Inline Spectrum Visualization (._spectrum())
features.description: Frequency spectrum analyzer (FFT) visualization showing audio frequencies
dependencies: Audio analyser must be connected (already done for _scope)
features.implementationNotes: Delegates to Strudel's analyze().draw() mechanism which handles scrolling spectrogram rendering. Visualization manager skips _spectrum widgets since Strudel handles them directly.

verificationCriteria.description: _spectrum method exists on Pattern.prototype
'_spectrum' type added to WidgetConfig in strudelEngine.ts
'_spectrum' registered via registerWidgetType()
renderSpectrum() method exists in visualizationManager.ts
Canvas element appears inline below the code
Spectrum analyzer displays scrolling spectrogram (via Strudel's analyze().draw())
verificationCriteria.expectedBehavior: Scrolling spectrogram showing frequency content over time

verificationCriteria.description: Spectrogram updates in real-time with audio playback
Low frequencies at bottom, high frequencies at top
Rendered by Strudel's analyze().draw() (skipped in viz manager)

acceptanceCriteria: Frequency bars render correctly using FFT data
Bar heights normalized between minDb (-100) and maxDb (-30)
Updates at ~60fps matching animation frame rate

features.name: Theme Context Provider
features.description: React context for theme state management with localStorage persistence

verificationCriteria.description: ThemeProvider wraps App component
useTheme hook returns theme and toggleTheme
Theme persists after page reload
Default theme is dark

features.name: Theme Toggle Button
features.description: Sun/Moon toggle button in header to switch themes

verificationCriteria.description: Toggle button visible in AppHeader
Button shows sun icon in dark mode
Button shows moon icon in light mode
Click toggles between themes
Tooltip indicates current action

features.name: REPL Dark Background
features.description: REPL window uses semi-transparent black background in dark mode

verificationCriteria.description: Dark mode REPL has rgba(0,0,0,0.75) background
Hydra visuals visible through REPL background
Light mode REPL retains current styling
Backdrop blur applied in both modes
Border color adapts to theme

features.name: CodeMirror Dark Theme
features.description: Custom CodeMirror theme with muted syntax colors for dark mode

verificationCriteria.description: Dark mode editor has light text on transparent background
Keywords highlighted in muted purple (#c792ea)
Strings highlighted in muted green (#c3e88d)
Comments styled italic gray (#6a737d)
Cursor visible as white
Selection uses semi-transparent white
Active line has subtle highlight

features.name: Header Dark Adaptation
features.description: AppHeader adapts glassmorphism styling to dark mode

verificationCriteria.description: Header uses rgba(0,0,0,0.4) background in dark mode
Header border uses rgba(255,255,255,0.1) in dark mode
Button text/icons visible in both modes
Backdrop blur maintained

features.name: HUD Dark Styling
features.description: HUD uses solid black background in dark mode for production visibility

verificationCriteria.description: HUD uses rgba(0,0,0,0.9) in dark mode
HUD text uses muted gray (#a0a0a0) in dark mode
FFT visualizers remain visible
Light mode HUD retains current styling

features.name: Dark Mode CSS Fallbacks
features.description: CSS overrides for Strudel REPL components that don't accept theme props

verificationCriteria.description: CSS file with .dark class overrides exists
Strudel REPL editor inherits dark styles
No style conflicts or flickering
Gutter background transparent in dark mode

prerequisites: Start the dev server: npm run dev
Open browser DevTools Console (F12) to view debug logs
